column4: Hi, I downloaded gxine recently to stream music. No mplayer worked fine for video in Firefox. But everytime I try to stream a video, gxine pops up. How do I change the default player for Firefox back to mplayer?
Does anyone know how to change the default in firefox back to mplayer?
I don't have a File Type under Content
hold on, I've got a dapper machine to check
what do I do under actions?
find the filetype that opens in the wrong player and change it back to mplayer
there is only one thing there called SPL. I want to be able to stream movies using mplayer in firefox
for that, try installing the plugin:
ok I'll give it a shot. Thanks, you guys are great
